pkgmetadata.longdescription: Uganda Time Series Database API // An R API providing easy access to a relational database with macroeconomic, financial and development related time series data for Uganda. Overall more than 5000 series at varying frequency (daily, monthly, quarterly, annual in fiscal or calendar years) can be accessed through the API. The data is provided by the Bank of Uganda, the Ugandan Ministry of Finance, Planning and Economic Development, the IMF and the World Bank. The database is being updated once a month.
